bike.description: 612 Select ChroMoly steel. Double butted down, top, and seat tubes. Externally tapered, ovalized, and dimpled chain stays, tapered seat stays. 1 1/8th headtube, 130mm rear spacing, English bottom bracket, 27.2 seat post

components.description: All-City Nature Boy 612 Select ChroMoly double butted tapered fork blades, lugged crown and matching dropout
Cane Creek 10 Series Black, 6061 T6 aluminum
Salsa Pro Moto 3 Black, four bolt, 1 1/8th threadless, 31.8 clamp
Salsa Cowbell 3 Black,  flared shallow round drop
Tektro CR720 Black, cantilever, wide Euro style
FSA Vero Black, alloy, forged, 42 tooth ring
TH Industries Steel cups, sealed bearing, 68X110mm
Kalloy SP-373 Black, alloy, single bolt, 27.2mm
All-City Standard Black, 130mm rear, Fixed/Free, 32 hole
Kenda Small Block Eight 700X35c Steel bead
